name: Gotta Go
description: With pressure mounting, the clock ticking, and only a vague idea where the bathroom is, players must avoid co-workers’ inane blathering and HR’s unwavering gaze as they make their way across the office to find their porcelain sanctuary.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Duo 2.0GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 500 MB GPU DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB GPU DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
